channel.title: Constitution on North of Tyne LPC
channel.description: Recent content in Constitution on North of Tyne LPC

item.title: Our constitution
item.description: Constitution of the North of Tyne Local Pharmaceutical Committee 1. Definitions In this Constitution – “The Act” means the National Health Service Act 2006, as amended. “Chief Officer” means the person employed or engaged by the Committee as its Chief Officer, Secretary, or Chief Executive Officer. “The Committee” and “LPC” mean the Local Pharmaceutical Committee recognised by the NHS Commissioning Board (NHSCB) under the provisions of the Act as representative of the persons providing pharmaceutical services and persons providing local pharmaceutical services from premises in the area for which the Committee is formed.
